item.title: Let's GO
item.description: C# is a great language. Each new version takes best solutions from other languages and keeps it very modern. However writing C# all the time both at work and at home feels boring sometimes. I like learning new languages as this provides good exercise. I’ve decided to write a simple go program. And because I didn’t have a better idea I took an app that I had already written in .
